original_title: Naked and Funny Special 2. Spicy Surprises
overview: If you like your TV with a little spice, along with hidden cameras, gorgeous girls, hilarious stunts, hot bodies and erotic practical jokes, you’ll love the sexy, spicy, surprising fun to be had in “Naked & Funny: Spicy Surprises!”
title: Naked and Funny Special 2. Spicy Surprises
